patthana17.4:1.1: Akusalaṁ saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana17.4:2.1_0: Abyākataṁ asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā naabyākato naasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko
patthana17.4:2.1_1: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Abyākataṁ asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā
patthana17.4:2.1_2: nakusalo naasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Abyākataṁ asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ
patthana17.4:2.1_3: dhammaṁ paccayā naakusalo naasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.4:2.1_4: Abyākataṁ asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nakusalo naasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko
patthana17.4:2.1_5: ca naabyākato naasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Abyākataṁ
patthana17.4:2.1_6: asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā naakusalo naasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko ca naabyākato
patthana17.4:2.1_7: naasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Abyākataṁ asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ
patthana17.4:2.1_8: dhammaṁ paccayā nakusalo naasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko ca naakusalo naasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko
patthana17.4:2.1_9: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe cha …pe… āsevane
patthana17.4:3.1: Kusalaṁ asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naasaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana17.4:4.1: Abyākataṁ asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naasaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana17.4:5.1: Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
